title: Can't Redeem Alistar and Tristana Code
body: Hey i was wondering why i couldnt redeem the alistar unchained and riot girl tristana even after following all the steps.

replies.body: Yes i tried that it worked for the alistar, but not the tristana and garen and my tickets havent been responded to as well.

You should be getting a response in your ticket shortly, but in the meantime make sure that you're using these links and following/subscribing to get those free champs/skins.

Riot Girl Tristana: https://www.facebook.com/leagueoflegends
Dreadknight Garen:  http://woobox.com/scrx56

If those links still aren't working, our agents will be able to get that taken care of shortly in your ticket!

I think this link will help you.

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/481q0j/psa_theres_an_automated_bot_that_can_give_you_the/
